issues.description:
The highway underpass has been vandalized. 

The style of graffiti on under 91 has driven the vandalism back up all over the neighborhood. 

This Summer a mural without tags should be painted over the under 91 project. 

Please fix these tags quickly before it spreads more LCI.

issues.description: Not particularly interesting or inspired graffiti on the walls of the railroad underpass between Humphrey and Lombard.  The architecture of the underpass, though, with dozens of arches and a  sort of catacomb ambiance, might work well for a talented graffiti artist looking for a large and unconventional canvas.
